item.description:
Intriguing! Masala Art in Needham has been doing Bollywood Karaoke nights. The next one is Sunday evening May 6th. I don't know the time range yet so will update this posting later when I know. The event is $20 in advance or $25 that night and includes appetizers, dinner buffet, tax and tip. The official flyer is here: http://www.masala-art.com/

I would love to go if I can find a few people to go too. I can't do karoke (horrible singing voice) nor do I speak any hindi but it sounds like a lot of fun to watch (and I love their food).

Please only sign up if you really will come as I don't want to end up there alone.

Thanks,
Tara
item.name: Bollywood Karaoke
